TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IOperationBehavior

summary.span: 实现可用于扩展服务或客户端应用程序中的操作的运行时行为的方法。

span.span: Implements methods that can be used to extend run-time behavior for an operation in either a service or client application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 接口可以在应用程序级别，修改、检查或扩展客户端或服务应用程序的整个操作的某个执行方面。Implement the interface to modify, examine, or extend some aspect of operation-wide execution at the application level for either client or service applications. - 使用 方法可以在运行时传递自定义数据，从而使绑定支持自定义行为。Use the method to pass custom data at runtime to enable bindings to support custom behavior. - 使用 方法可以修改、检查客户端应用程序中的客户端调度程序中的扩展，或向该客户端调度程序中插入扩展。Use the method to modify, examine, or insert extensions to a client dispatcher in a client application. - 使用 方法可以修改、检查服务应用程序中的对整个操作执行的扩展，或者在该服务应用程序中插入对整个操作执行的扩展。Use the method to modify, examine, or insert extensions to operation-wide execution in a service application. - 使用 方法可以确认 是否满足特定要求。Use the method to confirm that a meets specific requirements. 这可用于确保操作启用某一配置设置、支持特定功能以及其他需求。This can be used to ensure that an operation has a certain configuration setting enabled, supports a particular feature and other requirements. 对象可使用所有这些方法，但通常只有一种方法是重要的，在此情况下，未被使用的方法可返回且不执行任何操作。 objects can make use of any of these methods, but often only one is important; in such cases, the unused methods can return, performing no action. > [!NOTE] > 所有 方法都会将 对象作为参数传递。All of the methods pass an object as a parameter. 此参数只用于检查；如果您修改了 对象，则执行行为将是不确定的。This parameter is for examination only; if you modify the object the execution behavior is undefined. 通常， 可用于访问服务应用程序中的 对象的各个属性，以及客户端应用程序中的 对象的各个属性。 objects are typically used to access the various properties of the object in a service application and the object in a client application. 通常，开发人员会先检查扩展点，确定适合应用程序方案的自定义选项，然后才会在相应范围内实现自定义。Typically, the developer first reviews the extensibility points to determine which customization option suits the application scenario and then implements the customization at the appropriate scope. 例如， 对象可以在整个服务内为所有消息插入自定义，而 对象则可以在特定协定内为所有消息插入自定义。For example, objects can insert customizations for all messages in an entire service and objects can insert customizations for all messages across a specific contract, and so on. 有关的各种属性和使用自定义设置的说明，请参阅[扩展 ServiceHost 和服务模型层](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/extending-servicehost-and-the-service-model-layer.md)。For a description of the various properties and customizations available, see [Extending ServiceHost and the Service Model Layer](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/extending-servicehost-and-the-service-model-layer.md). 一旦决定使用自定义项 （和实现该自定义接口，如有必要） 和是适当的作用域的自定义项，必须要自定义项插入到 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 运行时通过实现并将操作行为添加到运行时。Once a customization has been decided upon (and the customization interface implemented if necessary) and the is the appropriate scope of customization, the customization must be inserted into the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) runtime by implementing and adding the operation behavior to the runtime. 有两种方法可将 添加到运行时：There are two ways to add the to the runtime: - 通过编程方式，先将自定义操作行为添加到 属性，然后打开服务主机（位于服务应用程序中）或通道工厂（位于客户端应用程序中）。Programmatically add the custom operation behavior to the property prior to the opening of the service host (in a service application) or the channel factory (in a client application). - 通过使用自定义属性添加行为。Add the behavior using a custom attribute. 若要执行服务自定义计划任务，则必须先将 对象添加到 属性，然后构造服务运行时，该构造操作是在对 调用 方法时执行的。To perform the service customization task for which it is intended, the object must be added to the property prior to the construction of the service runtime, which occurs when method is called on . 若要执行客户端自定义任务，则必须对 调用 方法或 方法之前，先将 对象添加到 属性。To perform a client customization task, the object must be added to the property before calling the method or the method on . 虽然该操作行为设计为在单个操作范围内的访问运行时，但您也可以通过访问父级运行时对象，来在更大范围内访问该运行时。Although the operation behavior is designed for easy access to the runtime at the scope of an individual operation, you can access the runtime at a larger scope by accessing the parent runtime object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 的实现，对操作调用该检查器时，该检查器对控制台进行了写入。The following code example shows an implementation of that writes to the console when the inspector is invoked on an operation. 此自定义只能附加到 或 ，因此，此自定义通常由操作行为插入。This customization can only be attached to the or and is therefore usually inserted by an operation behavior. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/interceptors.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/interceptors.vb#4)] 下面的代码示例演示了操作行为是如何将参数检查器附加到运行时的。The following code example shows how the operation behavior attaches the parameter inspector to the runtime. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddBindingParameters(class System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription operationDescription, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection bindingParameters) cil managed

param.name: operationDescription

span.span: The operation being examined.
Use for examination only.

param.span: 如果修改了操作说明，则结果将不确定。

span.span: If the operation description is modified, the results are undefined.

param.name: bindingParameters
param.span: 绑定元素支持该行为所需的对象的集合。

span.span: The collection of objects that binding elements require to support the behavior.

summary.span: 实现此方法可以在运行时将数据传递给绑定，从而支持自定义行为。

span.span: Implement to pass data at runtime to bindings to support custom behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 方法可以向绑定元素提供其支持操作行为所需的其他对象。Implement the method to provide binding elements with the extra objects they require to support the operation behavior. 如果向此处添加了绑定参数，则在创建通道侦听器或通道工厂时，绑定操作将会查找并处理这些对象。When binding parameters are added here, the binding can locate and process these objects when the channel listener or channel factory is created. 通常，您可通过实现 方法，来将有关该操作的信息传递给自定义绑定元素，以使该自定义绑定元素能够正确生成支持通道。Typically, you implement the method to pass information about the operation to a custom binding element so that it can build a supporting channel correctly. 如果无需任何修改，则不返回值。Return no value if no modifications are required.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyClientBehavior(class System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription operationDescription, class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation clientOperation) cil managed

param.name: operationDescription

span.span: The operation being examined.
Use for examination only.

param.span: 如果修改了操作说明，则结果将不确定。

span.span: If the operation description is modified, the results are undefined.

param.name: clientOperation
param.span: 运行时对象，公开 operationDescription 描述的操作的自定义属性。

span.span: The run-time object that exposes customization properties for the operation described by operationDescription.

summary.span: 在操作范围内执行客户端的修改或扩展。

span.span: Implements a modification or extension of the client across an operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 方法可以在通过特定操作使用的所有消息范围内，查看、修改或添加对客户端运行时中的自定义扩展。Implement the method to view, modify, or add a custom extension to the client runtime across all messages used with a specific operation. 有关利用客户端运行时对象可进行的自定义的详细信息，请参见 和 。For details about what customizations you can do with a client run-time object, see and . 如果该行为仅用于服务应用程序中，则建议 方法引发 。It is recommended that the method throw a if the behavior is only intended for use in a service application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 的实现，对操作调用该检查器时，该检查器对控制台进行了写入。The following code example shows an implementation of that writes to the console when the inspector is invoked on an operation. 此自定义只能附加到 或 ，因此，此自定义通常由操作行为插入。This customization can only be attached to the or and is therefore usually inserted by an operation behavior. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/interceptors.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/interceptors.vb#4)] 下面的代码示例演示了操作行为是如何将参数检查器附加到运行时的。The following code example shows how the operation behavior attaches the parameter inspector to the runtime. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#6)]

param.span: 运行时对象，公开 operationDescription 描述的操作的自定义属性。

summary.span: 在操作范围内执行服务的修改或扩展。

span.span: Implements a modification or extension of the service across an operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 方法可以在所有消息范围内或针对某个特定操作，查看、修改或扩展服务运行时。Implement the method to view, modify, or extend the service runtime across all messages or for a specific operation. 有关可在服务应用程序中进行的自定义的详细信息，请参见 和 。For details about what customizations you can do in a service application, see and . 如果该行为仅用于客户端应用程序中，则建议 方法引发 异常。It is recommended that the method throw a exception if the behavior is only intended for use in a client application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 的实现，对操作调用该检查器时，该检查器对控制台进行了写入。The following code example shows an implementation of that writes to the console when the inspector is invoked on an operation. 此自定义只能附加到 或 ，因此，此自定义通常由操作行为插入。This customization can only be attached to the or and is therefore usually inserted by an operation behavior. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/interceptors.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/interceptors.vb#4)] 下面的代码示例演示了操作行为是如何将参数检查器附加到运行时的。The following code example shows how the operation behavior attaches the parameter inspector to the runtime. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Validate(class System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription operationDescription) cil managed

param.name: operationDescription

span.span: The operation being examined.
Use for examination only.

param.span: 如果修改了操作说明，则结果将不确定。

span.span: If the operation description is modified, the results are undefined.

summary.span: 实现此方法可以确定操作是否满足某些设定条件。

span.span: Implement to confirm that the operation meets some intended criteria.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 方法可以检查结构，从而可以确认所有条件集。Implement the method to examine the structure to confirm any set of criteria. 要使用此方法，并不一定要在 或 中执行自定义。It is not necessary to perform any customizations in or to make use of this method. 如果操作传递验证，则返回；否则，抛出异常。If the operation passes validation, return; otherwise, throw an exception. 例如，可以使用 方法来确保对操作进行授权。For example, the method can be use to ensure that an operation is authorized.
